body: @michirusan If ur reading this could u pls tell me what the original source is, looking forward to reading it

I remember reading this years ago... somewhat grateful that I managed to stumble across it here. I still don't really like how Asuka acts at all, but well... it's the story. It is what it is. She's a bitch after all that shit goes down.

Shinji isn't as much of a spineless guy anymore.

this is the strangest form of  art plagiarism I've ever seen. I mean, the story is original (fanfiction, but doujins all are), but I could literally locate where the faces and bodies of everyone in this were directly traced (badly) from canon source materials, or actual maps, or well known photos...
It's canon if you want it to be
Is this canon? I am an evangelion fan but I don't want to read all this manga... please let me know
Thank you mister Trump for sharing hentai sites with us.....
